<title
    level="1"

    pfs=""
>
[The Rabbit Prince](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2496)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Stolen Fate Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=197) pg. 5, [Pathfinder #190: The Choosing](/Sources.aspx?ID=198) pg. 80</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** carried

</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

_The Rabbit Prince_ represents the unreliability of hand-to-hand combat, and how even cunning foes can lose to lucky novices. As long as you have _The Rabbit Prince_ invested, it grants you a +1 status bonus to attack rolls you make as a readied action.
